elements.2211.03174_09e849b8447459dd8fce261ca20f5: A reliable pose estimator robust to environmental disturbances is desirable for mobile robots
elements.2211.03174_4f8588d2cddfb78923c3df8da82fc: To this end, inertial measurement units (IMUs) play an important role because they can perceive the full motion state of the vehicle independently
elements.2211.03174_a72a64fa8b0a0eb4f360d54ede4f8: However, it suffers from accumulative error due to inherent noise and bias instability, especially for low-cost sensors
elements.2211.03174_5fbaaa7b90c7c20e6bdf5a615cbd0: In our previous studies on Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_b776ef697da4407217bf71efe1573: , we proposed to limit the error drift of the pure inertial navigation system (INS) by mounting an IMU to the wheel of the robot to take advantage of rotation modulation
elements.2211.03174_0cfac9c90984529a03456560311a0: However, it still drifted over a long period of time due to the lack of external correction signals
elements.2211.03174_e7531e06793071bd0ebfd2b2e0735: In this letter, we propose to exploit the environmental perception ability of Wheel-INS to achieve simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM) with only one IMU
elements.2211.03174_5ee924a2618b89328e34b7429bfa1: To be specific, we use the road bank angles (mirrored by the robot roll angles estimated by Wheel-INS) as terrain features to enable the loop closure with a Rao-Blackwellized particle filter
elements.2211.03174_64eabea526d4f7e1ff09be5b2c123: The road bank angle is sampled and stored according to the robot position in the grid maps maintained by the particles
elements.2211.03174_2fbd5c2bde697fa928a4d316e5d8a: The weights of the particles are updated according to the difference between the currently estimated roll sequence and the terrain map
elements.2211.03174_69b3b231872eb05766e15e17d8d0e: Field experiments suggest the feasibility of the idea to perform SLAM in Wheel-INS using the robot roll angle estimates
elements.2211.03174_7aec5bf6b7d58e4e16d3ee4f47b3d: In addition, the positioning accuracy is improved significantly (more than 30
elements.2211.03174_cc2ee2fea9c68bb87a9f31e74019a: Source code of our implementation is publicly available (https://github.com/i2Nav-WHU/Wheel-SLAM).
elements.2211.03174_012130a6be784928940db860551c4: State estimation is one of the most fundamental modules for autonomous vehicles
elements.2211.03174_87fcdf4464d2f814ec9f420edcbd5: Therefore, modern ground mobile robots are commonly equipped with both exteroceptive sensors, e.g., Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) receiver, cameras, Light Detection And Ranging (LiDAR), and proprioceptive sensors, e.g., Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) and odometer, to track the robot trajectories as well as perceive the environments
elements.2211.03174_8a631c2e0ac5b2c537865403bad0a: Among all these sensors, inertial sensors play a central role in robot navigation due to their self-contained characteristics, which means that it works independently without external signals and interaction with the environment
elements.2211.03174_5310cf2db6957e3c4060dc74e272a: In most of the existing works, inertial sensors are used to perform Dead Reckoning (DR) to either complement other navigation techniques
elements.2211.03174_34d31ee4b3aef45427e8f156b7f02: or bridge the signal blockage of other sensors
elements.2211.03174_778e6b4b075baf119e59f0e0d098a: Although the advances in the microelectromechanical (MEMS) technique have made IMU ubiquitous in various devices, an Inertial Navigation System (INS) suffers from the curse of error drift due to the inherent sensor noise and bias instability
elements.2211.03174_6158aad316d03d31a6dba2fe1e556: Therefore, it is both challenging and promising to improve the positioning performance of the stand-alone INS
elements.2211.03174_27c634b15189794e35e4344ce96c8: , we proposed Wheel-INS, a wheel-mounted IMU (Wheel-IMU)-based DR system, in our previous studies
elements.2211.03174_dfb753a0e1ac799a30e73a75d53c6: Wheel-INS achieved competitive pose estimation performance with only one IMU
elements.2211.03174_e1d27771c8a50c77e57eb6e25a9d1: It was illustrated that the positioning and heading accuracy of Wheel-INS had been improved by 23
elements.2211.03174_d339abf972a8518273d9bad6206fb: Moreover, benefiting from the rotation modulation, Wheel-INS showed desirable resilience to the constant gyro bias error
elements.2211.03174_e8e6ac6074887f798a198b4544fbb: In summary, there are two major advantages of Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_b456cd16bf3fb505be28395fbaa28: First, a similar information fusion scheme as ODO/INS is achieved by only one inertial sensor
elements.2211.03174_e534de50557ba425d580f4318a4b9: Second, the continuous rotation of the Wheel-IMU significantly limits the heading error drift
elements.2211.03174_4249fa919fd125e86d521cca7f149: Although Wheel-INS exhibits excellent DR performance, it is only a relative positioning solution lacking the ability to limit long-term error accumulation
elements.2211.03174_ae4f72966c619e7a4c9e33bc5664b: That is to say, the positioning error of Wheel-INS still drifts over time, especially when the stochastic error of the inertial sensor is significant
elements.2211.03174_9c5f057ec2b4d67c6a4b0b5906ee3: To correct the accumulated error without depending on absolute positioning techniques, a commonly used method is loop detection and relocalization
elements.2211.03174_b0c84e5a5c14f9e1d56efbc54e0a7: By extracting the environmental features with exteroceptive sensors, e.g., camera and LiDAR, the robot is allowed to recognize places that have been visited and the error drift can consequently be mitigated by, for example, performing a pose graph optimization using loop closure constraints
elements.2211.03174_d13ebf15db5db6716140ebf6166e0: From experiments of our prior work
elements.2211.03174_1d7fb16372047a2f7b94b393e8642: , we found that the robot roll estimation in Wheel-INS gave distinguishable and repeatable terrain-correlated responses, as shown in Fig.
elements.2211.03174_8d123429aae92a8cd749832fbdbe3: Therefore, it would be possible to encode the robot roll angle as the road bank feature, so as to enable the loop closure detection in Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_823187bb25fb33e03ccfec5c054cd: In addition, because the IMU is mounted on the wheel which is directly contacted with the ground, the roll angle estimated by Wheel-INS can represent the road bank angle precisely without being affected by the suspension system of the vehicle
elements.2211.03174_99ade8a228dd6510c162266bb0b1e: Based on the discussion above, this letter proposes Wheel-SLAM, a simultaneous localization and terrain mapping system using only one Wheel-IMU
elements.2211.03174_03de94f94401810d7071d8f33e8b6: Specifically, we extend our previous study on Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_fba1c959bf043bddb39f565b23069: by exploiting the robot roll angle estimates to encode the terrain feature which is used for loop closure detection to further limit the error drift of Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_fd2a675d8ef24fb20280cc6b4c6fb: Within a particle filter (PF) framework, the uncertainty of the robot state is sampled by multiple particles which maintain their own trajectories and terrain maps
elements.2211.03174_4c376cb673a46667c89d43cf8fade: By matching the current roll angle estimation with the map, loop closure can be discovered to update the weights of the particles
elements.2211.03174_8b7b648d77d7ed37f4035da8dff5e: In summary, our main contributions include:
elements.2211.03174_4818482e46321825cf673a28e61b9: A SLAM system with only one Wheel-IMU using the terrain feature (measured by the Wheel-IMU) is proposed and implemented.
elements.2211.03174_474362071e47f00c0cee0c99e68bc: We illustrate the feasibility of exploiting robot roll angle estimates to enable loop closure so as to limit the error drift effectively in Wheel-INS through extensive field experiments.
elements.2211.03174_d71926eca0c3ecd9cbe98123614b8: To the best of our knowledge, this is the first SLAM system using only one low-cost wheel-mounted IMU for the wheeled robot in the literature
elements.2211.03174_bdc8497a82fc1201d3bc81707e15c: We make our code publicly accessible.
elements.2211.03174_4e858a30afb79920a5d9109c010d6: Note that this letter mainly focuses on the feasibility of the idea (achieving loop closure with only one Wheel-IMU in Wheel-INS) instead of the development of a complete system that can be straightforwardly applied to practical applications.
elements.2211.03174_6b931a9b4f3df2b8ba1a7ada4472e: Terrain-based vehicle localization provides a usable alternative to GNSS to obtain absolute positioning results by exploiting road information
elements.2211.03174_01227a94d1c432948d4e48ea35bdd: The repetitive, location-dependent nature of the terrain features allows them to be used for robot localization and mapping
elements.2211.03174_e7bc89f783909104e66d912d98e8e: Usually, the terrain features are extracted with the in-vehicle inertial sensor, for example, an IMU can measure the road grades by vehicle pitch, road bank angles by vehicle roll, and road curvature by vehicle yaw rate
elements.2211.03174_66d010752aec9cb18ec63393ba195: The basic hypothesis is that the inertial sensor signals imply vehicle responses to the terrain surface and the same terrain surface excites similar vehicle motions
elements.2211.03174_c0b4850c97788f87a23d6abbba832: Existing literature mainly adopts vehicle pitch angles and pitch differences as the features for the terrain-based localization
elements.2211.03174_95ea3cbf0a8ca3448cff32b122365: , although the roll angle can play the same role
elements.2211.03174_20fdf278a5440531c5b0f89ffe725: However, using onboard inertial signals to determine the terrain information would be affected by the vehicle maneuver, for example, the braking may induce unexpected pitch variation of the vehicle
elements.2211.03174_6836f5ef0a97339324f0b0630c3ba: and the centripetal acceleration may introduce the difference between the vehicle roll angle and the road bank angle
elements.2211.03174_4c09ca7b6d8a51ff4737fe7a4b45f: Various methods have been investigated to integrate the terrain feature matching result into the localization pipeline
elements.2211.03174_2c2a182d85925bbd85293babe3e1a: , while PF has attracted more attention in recent studies
elements.2211.03174_39f4209381dc32dcb41c396ed3cff: In PF methods, the weights of the particles are updated by evaluating the difference between the in-vehicle measurements (e.g., roll, pitch, etc.) and the response in the map
elements.2211.03174_adab10dc3853575a7d7ac1a789834: used the Pearson-product correlation coefficient as a distance metric to compare the road grade measurements with the reference map.
elements.2211.03174_0d42fbfe8b414ab69ae79cb33734f: However, a pre-built map is indispensable in all these methods which limits its application
elements.2211.03174_5ffba21d2440acff9e515417ce348: In addition, the inertial sensors used to measure the terrain information are all placed on the vehicle body
elements.2211.03174_a2b4b250eae83663e3bff7f9fa967: , this letter proposes to localize the robot and measure the road bank angles simultaneously without a prior map
elements.2211.03174_efb57ad0e390246c6991a69cc9f80: As the IMU is mounted on the robot wheel, the terrain matching would not be affected by the vehicle maneuver which is the case when the IMU is mounted on the vehicle body.
elements.2211.03174_b97f0c485815f3f1cfd90d6e632dd: Recently deep learning-based inertial localization systems have shown promising results in both pedestrian
elements.2211.03174_c7e0a93c058dcf5713965f7c50b9a: These methods learn either motion information from raw inertial measurements
elements.2211.03174_79360aef1deecbb1815fac5e4b50a: to solve the inertial odometry problem in a data-driven way but fail to exploit environmental signals to limit long-term positional drift
elements.2211.03174_238f8de99dea0beb15d7eb444bc1f: proposed a pedestrian SLAM system using only foot-mounted IMU (FootSLAM) by taking advantage of human perception and cognition
elements.2211.03174_1a8260f1f7c6bb6d21bc3860e1734: A dynamic Bayesian network was employed to represent the fact that when a pedestrian walks in a constrained environment, e.g., an office building, he or she relies mainly on visual cues to avoid obstacles and determine accessible areas
elements.2211.03174_0cdc9bee3cd9f4c98487a5bc93d67: Specifically, the algorithm was implemented based on a PF where the weights of the particles were updated by the probability of the pedestrian crossing transitions in a regular 2D grid of adjacent hexagons
elements.2211.03174_9344fabc6df034bc33f7a49885782: After that, a probabilistic transition map implicitly encoding the environmental features that influence the pedestrian's visual impression and intention was constructed.
elements.2211.03174_ec1d7c365c11761c0c8daadd0fa14: Different from FootSLAM where the building layout is implicitly used to perform SLAM by taking advantage of human cognition, Wheel-SLAM uses the Wheel-IMU to explicitly extract the terrain feature for loop closure detection
elements.2211.03174_6a532561df1f798f9f5278a6694e9: In conclusion, Wheel-SLAM borrows ideas from both the terrain matching-based vehicle localization and FootSLAM
elements.2211.03174_593efa3ca340646b5109957f7add4: , we extend the approach by extracting the road features with the Wheel-IMU to enable loop closure, so as to further limit the error drift
elements.2211.03174_74cf8bef30844164d7bacc7bdb8ff: In Wheel-SLAM, we maintain and update the grid map in real-time and detect the loop closure using the DR result from Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_bad492009d9f7af536bdf889cabcd: After that, we use the roll angle sequence matching results between current estimates and the map to update the weights of the particles for the sake of robustness.
elements.2211.03174_6988c94f9dd24012431fb6f880342: In this section, a brief introduction to Wheel-INS is first provided
elements.2211.03174_e3d2fd4264c5f1b1fbee4c4af5aee: Then we explain the details of the PF-based Wheel-SLAM algorithm, including the dynamic Bayesian model, the construction of the terrain map, and the update of the weights of the particles.
elements.2211.03174_3dfcf4d69aa539c6f9dc5aaba82d3: It is used to provide the robot odometry and roll angle estimation
elements.2211.03174_cce693b6d29c24f6defda948dc409: There are two major advantages of Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_b928e6c4e404ab1944146a40db745: First, the wheel velocity can be calculated by the gyro output and wheel radius enabling the same information fusion as ODO/INS with only one IMU (no other sensors)
elements.2211.03174_534e0ba1fd83628d7de95d7aa4953: Second, it can take advantage of rotation modulation to limit the error drift of INS.
elements.2211.03174_df923f9fd60acf2276091ffe6d607: Due to the space limitation, we just outline the algorithm of Wheel-INS here
elements.2211.03174_285d9ec80d8dedad037069976c25c: Please refer to our earlier papers
elements.2211.03174_a2cbe7fc7b683ac488941f79e32de: for details, e.g., the rotation modulation of the Wheel-IMU, the definition of the misalignment errors, etc.
elements.2211.03174_07d8e361bb38831218ae7a3b1d912: depicts the installation of the Wheel-IMU and the definition of related coordinate systems
elements.2211.03174_1e33cca34929ac27fea9700b81e5f: The system overview of Wheel-INS is shown in Fig.
elements.2211.03174_dd4ad4997a8dbe4d1bb31ecfc8ce6: First, the forward INS mechanization is performed to predict the robot states
elements.2211.03174_4e8d8c7688cf9edc12daaa2248d40: At the same time, the gyroscope outputs in the
elements.2211.03174_c4f6b8d892f416d3a319e3817aa67: -axis of the Wheel-IMU are used to calculate the wheel speed
elements.2211.03174_d3cf8014ccf4ce2dca13a7e797814: Then, this vehicle velocity is treated as an external observation with non-holonomic constraint (NHC)
elements.2211.03174_65aefee090c7b24ed3686018fdc47: to update the state through an error-state extended Kalman filter (EKF)
elements.2211.03174_ec1b3f7d679f19918b34f25cbbe72: The state vector can be written as
elements.2211.03174_54f106b3452b9c9238d4297bdd015: indicates the uncertainty of the variables;
elements.2211.03174_1a65788d91277c5b1b8830d32e69d: indicate the position, velocity and attitude errors of INS, respectively;
elements.2211.03174_e6854c108dfb161e8e9a0044fc4ae: denote the residual bias errors of the gyroscope and the accelerometer, respectively;
elements.2211.03174_6e8da5c9ade739929e50695fa3cac: are the residual scale factor errors of the gyroscope and accelerometer, respectively.
elements.2211.03174_744fcec367abe3944c8b2c390b824: The forward wheel velocity calculated by the gyroscope data of the Wheel-IMU and wheel radius can be written as
elements.2211.03174_595e25f621cd218744c82fe61d09e: are the observed and true vehicle forward velocity, respectively;
elements.2211.03174_8ec08067378401c28e551f1ee4249: is the gyroscope output in the
elements.2211.03174_ad03569dac08d02f664e38f967fda: is the true value of the angular rate in the
elements.2211.03174_2c1fc944df4487d7c1de110bad5d2: is the observation noise of the wheel velocity, modeled as Gaussian white noise.
elements.2211.03174_810a54117e3e9d3eba28d6256eabc: By integrating with NHC, the 3D velocity observation can be expressed as
elements.2211.03174_1b3f034cfdf4f17f8a24540bd94d4: is the velocity measurement noise vector, including both the forward velocity noise and NHC noise.
elements.2211.03174_940b79db561547448267032d0410f: Because the Wheel-IMU rotates with the wheel, the pitch of the robot is unknown in Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_b2fe88064f97b978b7dd19dfddc82: In other words, we cannot determine the robot ascent and descent in Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_33ab4ba6d4b2ed2e9538853c02edc: Therefore, it is assumed that the robot is moving on a horizontal plane
elements.2211.03174_42a7d181070f02f67181a5409ca2e: illustrated that this assumption does not cause significant navigation error.
elements.2211.03174_bf60e969ac63228acf0002388539c: A PF is a sequential Monte Carlo method where the basic idea is the recursive computation of relevant probability distributions using the concepts of importance sampling and approximation of probability distributions with discrete random measures
elements.2211.03174_2bdeee73da95998d0a784413e5606: In PF, the posterior distribution of the robot state is represented by a set of particles that evolve recursively with the integration of new information
elements.2211.03174_8ab00a0f29e66c98dc75dab09b6d5: Based on the technique of Rao-Blackwellization
elements.2211.03174_0369676e15c0b868e4df37ada57f7: , Wheel-SLAM decomposes the SLAM problem into a robot localization problem and a terrain mapping problem that is conditioned on the robot pose estimate.
elements.2211.03174_f78f894deff9afc711c5451fd09c4: In Wheel-SLAM, we try to estimate the posterior
elements.2211.03174_9e24a7b8c1784f34d36612f6f9442: which is the distribution representing the robot state
elements.2211.03174_c79ec943fbe0d77c9f9587b7f0636: based on the set of control inputs
elements.2211.03174_e5a68fc48fe01054ace6c537b3fdf: which governs the robot motion and the road bank angle observations
elements.2211.03174_37a6c8b7c5357d0e93c52b754e38a: The conditional independence property of the Wheel-SLAM problem implies that the posterior in (
elements.2211.03174_bee805a67b2e598dcfb9990e517d9: is the total number of the features
elements.2211.03174_9d19f7ea4a3af3b06b0441486111d: In Wheel-SLAM, Wheel-INS is performed for the robot state estimation as well as the road bank angle perception.
elements.2211.03174_438811f7fe087e344d53c57149d33: Wheel-SLAM uses a PF to estimate the robot trajectory distribution
elements.2211.03174_417fc8ebdce6ea4a0bb28b3d0eb3a: For each particle, the individual trajectory-based terrain map are independent to each other
elements.2211.03174_f95bd8536f04d5a0bbe5412ef7979: As a result, every particle is composed of a robot pose and a terrain map; thus, the
elements.2211.03174_affc32ff7eb9d9dadcb5ddce3dd70: , is the index of the particle while
elements.2211.03174_4c1b3a8ad2d1526e92ed66d4b8224: is the total number of the used particles.
elements.2211.03174_6a1ce7abfe19862f6a44d62d985fa: is the pose of the robot estimated by the
elements.2211.03174_f3e92f1b115166c29a60ea2f8dc92: is the terrain map maintained by the
elements.2211.03174_aa8f581c64265d7321a10e03a3930: Here the robot pose is represented by 2D translation
elements.2211.03174_1e523ae652f39cfe273ceb8df4d83: as Wheel-INS cannot estimate pitch angle, namely, the robot motion in the vertical direction
elements.2211.03174_5dd0a7fd4a18ce491a6f8fc0d553d: The Wheel-SLAM algorithm consists of four main steps: 1) Sample new robot state by the motion model; 2) Update the terrain map; 3) Update the particle weights once a convinced loop closure is reported; 4) Resample the particles when it is necessary
elements.2211.03174_122bedc4b9aa43e91cf92e88bb6be: Algorithm 1 shows an overview of Wheel-SLAM.
elements.2211.03174_cd6430f7e1b82f20e99421c84319c: The first step is to generate new pose for each particle by sampling from the robot probabilistic motion model:
elements.2211.03174_db1688b3035d046d5177f125356d4: which means that the robot pose,
elements.2211.03174_e492d7c099115302a2b1b24c5819f: , is a probabilistic function of the robot control
elements.2211.03174_5f4128f962bc1f7f12787af85113a: Here, we adopt Wheel-INS to predict the robot state.
elements.2211.03174_aa92a01cb9eb597612ad304d913a5: Compared to the hexagon grid map used in FootSLAM
elements.2211.03174_dd740339a5cc5380a6c76597dc311: , we simplify the grid to square due to the relatively simple robot motion mode
elements.2211.03174_05c8ba4a1cde26c7e5171bfd4128c: As we assume that the vehicle is moving on the horizontal plane, we build a 2D grid map
elements.2211.03174_76980b10e43e96578472b0c6469a3: Each grid holds the corresponding road bank angle estimated by Wheel-INS at that position
elements.2211.03174_ec15a396f91185e01713821423250: illustrates the grid map constructed along with the robot pose evolution.
elements.2211.03174_217445be6ed4edaaf5072973dbb57: In the beginning, all the particles are assigned the same weight
elements.2211.03174_37fe37dee4e4322a59318985ee420: When the robot moves, each particle has a different trajectory and terrain map
elements.2211.03174_d9be51197f1d31eae1e4ed8fa6b6c: To ensure the reliability of loop closure and reduce the impact of an outlier, we set three criteria
elements.2211.03174_17ada34556985cb8c4192c6bd43dd: First, loop closures need to be continuously detected by the robot position in a window of length
elements.2211.03174_206a7b4b91bca9a84b6a845a42e74: roll sequence matching scores using Pearson correlation coefficient
elements.2211.03174_eac92346fe1a8dc409368f3458f22: and compare them with a threshold
elements.2211.03174_555171ef4019ec2acd83fcaa2b5e0: ) coefficients need to be larger than
elements.2211.03174_aecf38ca6c084f4c9858553cef4b0: Third, the correlation coefficient at the current position needs to be larger than the threshold
elements.2211.03174_e70b4e5f5c15035c5f6cb71a3621f: If all three requirements are met, we think it is a true loop closure and subsequently update the particle weights as follows:
elements.2211.03174_90e5e09d1e3d6514966a4caf39150: indicates the number of the particle;
elements.2211.03174_d83d6e6e435f469af2ee9697b5d85: ) is the number of the correlation coefficients larger than the threshold in the window
elements.2211.03174_2488694d3ef24345ca2e896603cb4: ; RMSE indicates the root mean square error;
elements.2211.03174_abd92bfbcf5fe69e69b7b890195ea: is the collection of the correlation coefficients larger than the threshold in the window
elements.2211.03174_58ff6526c671404fe1cdc840a58f7: After that, normalization is performed to make the sum of the weights equal to one.
elements.2211.03174_a275829a378b1135fe118c1705c02: Note that although Wheel-SLAM requires the exact revisit of the robot, the vehicle doesn't need to always drive on the same road
elements.2211.03174_b8559586d2a4d7e5eab7ff00e1365: The position error will accumulate when the robot explores an unknown environment, but it can be corrected once the robot is back on a previously-visited road
elements.2211.03174_aafecae2bb29e741612927eaf3e25: Please refer to Section IV for the experimental results and discussion
elements.2211.03174_518bef46f48822913f7261e2e3423: Moreover, as our algorithm requires a sequence of road bank angles for matching, it is not able to detect loop closure effectively at crossroads where the robot may enter a place perpendicular to its last entrance direction.
elements.2211.03174_3fa2aadf4e4a04fc13325eff77b0b: This section presents and discusses the real-world experimental results to illustrate the positioning performance of Wheel-SLAM
elements.2211.03174_533309baf7c2c9b684ea9fcacbbf8: As this work focus on the feasibility of the idea (achieving loop closure with only one Wheel-IMU) instead of the development of a complete system, we do not evaluate the computational efficiency of Wheel-SLAM
elements.2211.03174_0b40bfe7f277511c1525361731070: In addition, there is no paper in the literature studying SLAM with the same sensor set (wheel-mounted inertial sensors)
elements.2211.03174_4bfe73d3935f0655a94f57ff7930c: We only compare the proposed Wheel-SLAM with its predecessor, Wheel-INS, to illustrate its effectiveness and discuss its characteristics
elements.2211.03174_56cb758b096a75bbd7b2192ffb35a: First, the experimental conditions are described
elements.2211.03174_bdc2770af83b48b54507011ba85ff: After that, we compare the positioning accuracy of Wheel-SLAM with Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_5ecfd6eb327b538d923ad8272ec47: The characteristics of Wheel-SLAM are also analyzed
elements.2211.03174_6fad69dffde9661312c8339c1b0e7: Finally, we further discuss the key components which play a central role in Wheel-SLAM and some limitations in real-world applications.
elements.2211.03174_b859e26afcef5fb0545c98a2607a2: To demonstrate the feasibility and effectiveness of the proposed Wheel-SLAM system, we carried out five sets of field tests using a car on the campus of Wuhan University
elements.2211.03174_589245c24d283daede651d6ce592d: The car was instrumented with one Wheel-IMU and reference system to provide the ground truth of the vehicle pose, as shown in Fig.
elements.2211.03174_1f3d993dbdf02e8c137b7b3ddf177: The characteristics of the vehicle motion in the tests are shown in Table
elements.2211.03174_0f2b76c27c291e9c6f4051e9610f0: We used the same MEMS IMU from our prior works
elements.2211.03174_7ced927e84d0acdd25edeb4926a41: The MEMS IMU contained four ICM20602 (TDK InvenSense) inertial sensor chips, a chargeable battery module, a microprocessor, an SD card for data collection, and a Bluetooth module for communication and data transmission
elements.2211.03174_07faf0ae6412e92816e09e61b73aa: One can use an android phone to control the data collection
elements.2211.03174_4f15ad9ff57e8756de12e40b411f9: We collected the data of one chip of the Wheel-IMU for post-processing
elements.2211.03174_36ac2a63609b595e7bf990f5e8d2e: The reference system used in the experiments was a high-accuracy position and orientation system with a tactical-grade IMU (POS320, MAP Space Time Navigation Technology Co., Ltd., China)
elements.2211.03174_401a77f9c3e269907b1c5bb6682cc: The reference data were processed through a smoothed post-processed kinematic (PPK)/INS integration method
elements.2211.03174_c651c34b9e4479c9ac9ee05410636: The main technical parameters of both the MEMS IMU and the high-end IMU are listed in Table
elements.2211.03174_ef61d5fbbafd89ef524e01d565962: , where ARW denotes the angle random walk; Acc. denotes the accelerometer; VRW denotes the velocity random walk
elements.2211.03174_e3545af73c5016e5d86efbef4bf3f: In Sequence (Seq.) 1, the car was traveling back and forth on two parallel and opposite-direction roads
elements.2211.03174_f358d4dd576d10f8045a8fc026667: Seq. 2, and Seq. 3 are circular trajectories where the vehicle moved several times in one direction
elements.2211.03174_658143ebde44b302666b05fab37d1: Seq. 4 and Seq. 5 are more complicated ones with two circles in large-scale environments
elements.2211.03174_a3fba7abd65590c41751be7888b26: In Seq. 4 and Seq. 5, the car not only traveled in the same lane in the same direction but moved in opposite directions on the same road
elements.2211.03174_4c12e5e7ba97b25847c8b6b54a643: Note that in Seq. 1, Seq. 2, and Seq. 3, the car sometimes also changed the lane
elements.2211.03174_dae13429942673b2af6881ba234d4: Please refer to our source code webpage for the street views of the sequences.
elements.2211.03174_3cb6022e4d0dae9ca62d3f4d50ac6: The static IMU data before the car started moving were used to obtain the initial roll and pitch angle of the Wheel-IMU, as well as the initial value of the gyroscope bias
elements.2211.03174_e6d174ed4131db8ff0fcd62a11e5f: Other inertial sensor errors were set as zero
elements.2211.03174_23be0277e5aee1c8301351cd73cb9: The key parameters of Wheel-SLAM set in the experiments are listed in Table
elements.2211.03174_53a0c8f83bc928551ddf423be9fdb: Standard deviation is denoted as STD in Table
elements.2211.03174_1c905e07ba2da17e12f0f1b971df1: compares the positioning and heading errors of Wheel-SLAM and Wheel-INS in all five experiments, respectively
elements.2211.03174_7b9b07e8553ad084e2f911dc671c0: Please refer to our source code webpage for the positioning results of Wheel-SLAM overlaid on Google earth
elements.2211.03174_b0f364cef7d09001eb98819aeeae4: It is obvious that compared to Wheel-INS, Wheel-SLAM can suppress the error drift effectively, even in complicated scenarios where the car moves in different directions in large-scale environments, e.g., Seq. 4 and Seq. 5
elements.2211.03174_bd86c478206d996065f3a846ec2aa: However, the positioning error is increasing with drift of heading error in Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_90a799d9b6b348e6342d2bb7cbd9b: In addition, we can also notice that there are periodic decreases in the positioning error of Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_e647d6b0165630c4b7e8fd7e48daa: This is due to the loop closure of the trajectory which cancels part of the cumulative error as discussed in our prior work
elements.2211.03174_f6b584de7b069810db6119566ba48: At the start of the experiments, the positioning results of Wheel-SLAM drift together with Wheel-INS because all the particles are sampled from Wheel-INS according to the Gaussian distribution and there is no external measurement to correct the position error
elements.2211.03174_04729ef46810aa62b21168187c1e4: Once a credible loop closure is reported by some particles, they get a larger weight
elements.2211.03174_e9bc497f578b743bacba04b7a5cd3: Accordingly, the vehicle position would deflect to the previous trajectory when the vehicle visited the same place the last time
elements.2211.03174_57d6b92306fe6d5e3429f6707c288: It can be observed that there are some sharp decreases in the positioning and heading error of Wheel-SLAM in the experiments, such as the 150
elements.2211.03174_576e16445c32846b664fb7c481d91: This is because we use the weighted average value of all the particles as the output
elements.2211.03174_e55c6878910d3b8a2e2318d06e799: The increased weights of those particles which detect the loop closure would drag the vehicle position to the previous trajectory
elements.2211.03174_d5d1b43674a0e30131cf4d3961f2f: In addition, we only correct the current robot state but not the historical trajectory
elements.2211.03174_306bc33f42596ad1d57daa952f6dd: Using modern graph optimization tools, e.g., gtsam
elements.2211.03174_7528325c3083ca1ad89a2b0b858c0: , can jointly optimize the history state so as to make the trajectory smoother and improve the overall accuracy, but this letter mainly focuses on the feasibility to extract road features to enable loop closure in Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_c2a2921d76cd16f8886f619a50c12: We can observe from the figures that both the positioning and heading error of Wheel-INS increase quickly over time, while the same value of Wheel-SLAM is constrained at a certain level
elements.2211.03174_e5f6cee70dcbff870307d46ec5990: When there is no loop closure, Wheel-SLAM exhibits the same drift as Wheel-INS in the first circle of the trajectory
elements.2211.03174_d7678388f969b59536e5e042ba536: However, as the vehicle continues to revisit the roads previously visited, the position drift of Wheel-SLAM can be limited as that in the first circle because of the loop closure mechanism
elements.2211.03174_7d85d322b8a9fb1b7e32c9990cfda: This suggests that the proposed method is effective to limit the error growth of Wheel-INS by using terrain information perceived by the Wheel-IMU to perform the loop closure
elements.2211.03174_5630884a3f301f88a0eaae0fff720: It is worth mentioning that in Seq. 5, there is a large position and heading drift from about 860
elements.2211.03174_08a17d70088bdc859fc738864df51: This is because the vehicle position error of Wheel-INS drifts quickly at that time
elements.2211.03174_a190988572337bce5ea2bcfe2d026: Meanwhile, there is no loop closure reported by the particles, so Wheel-SLAM exhibits a similar drift trend during this time period
elements.2211.03174_36a9e64f95b079397a9ca23cad801: Afterward, a loop closure is successfully detected in Wheel-SLAM at about 1100
elements.2211.03174_41e20e6d2712726bbaa0158109e7d: s, resulting in a radical error correction.
elements.2211.03174_070e7cb29a997f5f169dc783067bd: lists the error statistics of the navigation results of Wheel-SLAM and Wheel-INS in all five experiments
elements.2211.03174_88ea904d876d72e3f9120667bfeaa: We calculate the root mean square error (RMSE) of the horizontal position and heading (denoted as Horizontal Pos
elements.2211.03174_c9680425c53b4eb659ddd815c03c9: , respectively) as the indicators to evaluate the navigation performance
elements.2211.03174_f57ae4a9e18ec53fb7cd5654e03b0: Additionally, given the stochasticity of the particle sampling, we run the algorithm multiple times to get the mean value of each test
elements.2211.03174_06956e170eafb61531cf597152121: It can be learned that thanks to the loop closure detection, Wheel-SLAM overwhelmingly outperforms Wheel-INS in terms of both position and heading estimation
elements.2211.03174_a26a6ab8dbe88543521662d52fcd6: Compared to Wheel-INS, the positioning and heading accuracy has been improved by 32.7
elements.2211.03174_0a9af4f4c8d071a7b1daa17b5ddbe: As Seq. 1, Seq. 2, and Seq. 3 are rather simple, there are more opportunities for loop closures
elements.2211.03174_34b428bf2a1bf12562d61b68e2163: Therefore, the performance improvements in these three tests are more significant than that in Seq. 4 and Seq. 5
elements.2211.03174_7140a377d06a2b74cbbab61a3404b: The terrain maps built by Wheel-SLAM in Seq. 1, Seq. 2, and Seq. 4 are shown in Fig.
elements.2211.03174_8a62c0d1490f7d2e6c2683ce5a2f6: Because the wheel of the vehicle contacts the ground directly, the mapping is not affected by the suspension system of the vehicle especially when the vehicle maneuvering is large which is the case when the IMU is mounted on the vehicle body
elements.2211.03174_a176625b5c682cf06df0a92e81498: Furthermore, these maps can be used to provide valuable information to monitor the deformation and deterioration of the roads.
elements.2211.03174_5094fa203441f85e8d4c54540ab50: Analysis on the characteristics of Wheel-SLAM
elements.2211.03174_be3bdae9e1a6c701870d6f21a935a: To further evaluate the performance and stability of Wheel-SLAM, we set different particle numbers to compare the positioning performance
elements.2211.03174_12863f9594c0268ff835b5923b78b: The algorithm was run 100 times for each configuration
elements.2211.03174_0084d66d33e7951c09fcaf431e64d: It can be observed that the position error of Wheel-SLAM is more centralized when there are more particles, which means that the stability of Wheel-SLAM is improved with the increment of particles
elements.2211.03174_6a5f28b32e4cda77da1db3c920346: This is because it is more likely for the system to detect the real loop closure with more particles and the performance would also be less susceptible to anomalies
elements.2211.03174_924d2fe394505b7104b782ac79fa3: However, there is no obvious gain by adding particles from 1000 to 2000 because of the diminishing marginal effect
elements.2211.03174_3127743e0e65f557494398e1a65d8: In addition, the accuracy of Wheel-SLAM also depends on the position error when the vehicle visits the place for the first time
elements.2211.03174_3f8f3ef4afe8e9e0f6944d563b73a: In consequence, continuing to add the particles only improve position accuracy lightly.
elements.2211.03174_ff68aa7bbde73d6bb6c0f95b02f33: Furthermore, it can be learned that in a statistical sense, the overall positioning performance of Wheel-SLAM is also not significantly enhanced with the increase of the particles
elements.2211.03174_19b54d92671e70ccac93479bd6507: Although there are some outliers when the particle number is small (= 100), the system is robust to recognize the loop closure thanks to the excellent DR ability of Wheel-INS.
elements.2211.03174_89d3d7ff408085d263dac32b1e79b: The core principles behind Wheel-SLAM can be summarized as follows: 1) Particles are spread to sample the possible state of the robot and detect the loop closure by the trajectory maintained by each particle; 2) The road bank angle sequence matching result is used to update the particle weights, so as to pick out the most trusted one(s)
elements.2211.03174_c46289d1111b44d6e039fea562b17: What plays a central role in Wheel-SLAM is the roll sequence matching strategy
elements.2211.03174_7065d49868b039f791d65c120615b: It must be robust enough to keep the outstanding particles while filtering out false alarms
elements.2211.03174_c80179ab253d4142d22ebace20f0a: Therefore, we used rather strict loop closure detection criteria to make the loop closure detection robust.
elements.2211.03174_78442b3433d3c811bb91bdd9cf8f5: However, it can be realized that there are two major limitations in the application of Wheel-SLAM
elements.2211.03174_c0bdb5efa871b62c2b6d7d4f8ed2d: First, the robot must strictly revisit the previous places with a certain length
elements.2211.03174_d73b7883842a01b63231917b74a58: It is not like the vision-based SLAM where the vehicle has the remote sensing ability by using exteroceptive sensors, e.g., camera and LiDAR
elements.2211.03174_2ce27bf9841ea72a8a52b9f301e0a: In Wheel-SLAM, the Wheel-IMU is used to extract the terrain features which can only be obtained by the exact arrival of the robot
elements.2211.03174_b3eac2783a30f984703cb8e61a0f6: Second, the success of the loop closure depends on the matching of the road bank angle sequence
elements.2211.03174_bce4d3cc5d0449fb9d98500de0db3: If the robot is moving on extremely smooth roads without any fluctuations in the bank angle, it would be difficult to detect loop closure.
elements.2211.03174_c24c7c84c4fd30e3afc53df7a7e7f: In this study, we propose to perform SLAM with only one Wheel-IMU by exploiting the environmental perception ability of the Wheel-IMU
elements.2211.03174_84739a598962883b6bbdbbe593d65: To be specific, we extend our previous study on Wheel-INS to Wheel-SLAM by extracting the terrain feature from the robot roll angle estimates to enable loop closure detection
elements.2211.03174_e9e7f5f1bec9515b3449894253be0: The system is implemented with a Rao-Blackwellized particle filter where each particle maintains its own robot state and grid map.
elements.2211.03174_c842c0527e76de65d1746a19dae6b: Experimental results show that the proposed method can effectively suppress the error drift of Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_2a8191d5f2b07031c1b75bfe6d44e: The positioning and heading accuracy has been averagely improved by 52.6
elements.2211.03174_878618f852bf9434af47dcfbdfa0d: However, Wheel-SLAM has two major limitations
elements.2211.03174_714940b4808e30ee7b42d57107f80: First, a certain level of variation in the bank angles of the road is needed.
elements.2211.03174_c0f4bad048061931cb32a0738250b: Second, the robot has to revisit the same place exactly.
elements.2211.03174_8d9df68596523e7fc22a28d7eac43: Wheel-SLAM would be suitable for those kinds of robots that move repeatedly in given areas, for example, the sweeping robots and patrol robots in restricted areas
elements.2211.03174_316a35ad65188fc176f000efb5d8b: For future research, integrating Wheel-SLAM with other exteroceptive sensors (e.g., camera and LiDAR) would be promising to improve the robustness and applicability of the robot navigation system.
elements.2211.03174_f64a2b4ee55bf9865a46815d61002: However, Wheel-INS still drifted over a long period of time due to the lack of external correction signals
elements.2211.03174_a60d5d59d5f6387ac6dad4b30d916: The source code of our implementation is publicly available (https://github.com/i2Nav-WHU/Wheel-SLAM).
elements.2211.03174_6bd180418c4e93a48efc414a6849d: estimation is one of the most fundamental modules for autonomous vehicles
elements.2211.03174_dba5a49adf9401df720543130be55: In other words, we cannot determine the robot's ascent and descent in Wheel-INS
elements.2211.03174_80da9dde2d3d4121b553c04f8a68c: illustrated that this assumption does not cause significant navigation errors.
elements.2211.03174_831bd5223d07b1fa115a37c136e38: For each particle, the individual trajectory-based terrain map is independent of each other
elements.2211.03174_5cec76a543051fd453b5a6aa18d20: The first step is to generate a new pose for each particle by sampling from the robot probabilistic motion model:
elements.2211.03174_a5d972d0b52173029da917cad6e8d: Therefore, we used a rather strict loop closure detection criteria to make the loop closure detection robust.
